name: Root's up
description:
Root's Up

A game developed in 48 hours! (Global Game Jam 2023)

GGJ game page: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/rootswalkingsim-7

Collect the necessary ingredients for a soup while you run and jump in a procedurally generated infinite looping world. The world is generated every time you play the game. No matter where you go, you will always go back to the soup cauldron. You are rooted there!

Controls: 

  • Move: WASD/ArrowKeys
  • Look: Mouse
  • Interact: E

Donations will support the development of the complete game. 

MacOS build has not been tested.
